name: Blasted Marbles
description:
An extremely early development "version" of Marble Blast Blasted Marbles. Each version may be split into different prototypes. Donations are appreciated but it's perfectly understandable if you don't want to pay.

Controls:
Move : Arrow Keys

Reduce Weight : Space

Increase Weight : Left Alt

Reset : "R"

Note : Prototype builds will be in 720p only for a while for consistency across different computers.
